name: entrepreneurial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to someone who starts their own business or is good at seeing new opportunities to make money: entrepreneurial spirit She'll make money - she's got that entrepreneurial spirit. With more people self-employed, has our society become more entrepreneurial? See
entrepreneur
More examplesFewer examplesThe company must move from being an entrepreneurial startup to a more mature and steadily growing business.Lower taxes appeal to a new generation of college-educated and entrepreneurial business owners.Many hi-tech firms are run by entrepreneurial people rather than professional corporate managers.Policymakers want to reinforce the entrepreneurial climate.

See more results »
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe someone who makes money by starting their own business, especially when this involves seeing a new opportunity and taking risks: Students use their entrepreneurial skills to present a business plan. The successful candidate will be an entrepreneurial, goal-oriented problem solver.
